message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12750. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go down to $12000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a fair deal.
